name: AVALON COUNTRY CLUB AT SHARON, INC., Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, Bureau of Health Promotion and Risk Reduction, Respondent

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 25th day of October, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
